Award Description:
The Council is seeking to establish a Framework Agreement ("the Framework") under which the Purchasers can procure hackney carriage, private hire vehicle services and bus & coach (public service vehicles). There will be no guarantee of work under the Framework, but the Purchasers envisage that they will make considerable use of the Framework throughout its lifetime.

The Framework will cover the Council's requirements taxi, minibus and coach services. It will encompass Home to School, Home to care, College Transport, Transport for Older People, Looked After Children, People with Additional Needs, other Vulnerable People within Social Care and any other transport request as identified by the Council.

It is expected that this Framework will have multiple Contractors to maximise efficiency savings for the Purchasers. 

Contractors will be drawn from this Framework Agreement to satisfy these requirements.
Supplier Address - street address: 2 East View Avenue, Cramlington, Northumberland, NE23 1DY
